name: EDM (Extinction Dino Meteor)
description:
THE WEB VER HAS BEEN REMOVED DUE TO ME BEING AN IDIOT. IT WILL BE FIXED AFTER LUDUM DARE VOTING

Despite the musical name and colourful pixel art this game is not a joyful happy experience. A meteor is headed straight towards the earth and will no doubt cause the extinction of all the inhabiting dinosaurs. You can try to juggle the meteor in the air but in the end you’re only delaying the inevitable.

Use the mouse to keep the meteors from hitting the ground and see how high of a score you can get!

THE LEADERBOARD ONLY WORKS IN DOWNLOADED VERSIONS. Idk why, sorry :( -PossiblyAxolotl

Original Song by The Captain Moo
